dataset.titleFlag: Boolean value to determine the input text -> bool
dataset.oovToken: OOV token for the data -> string
dataset.paddingToken: Padding token for the data -> string
dataset.paddingMode: Mode of padding (pre or post) -> string

model.embeddingFlag: Boolean value to determine the embedding layer type -> bool
model.modelFlag: Type of recurrent model (rnn or lstm) -> string
model.biDirectionalFlag: Boolean value to determine bidirectional units -> bool
model.dropoutValue: Dropout value for the model -> float
model.recurrentUnits: Units of the recurrent layer -> int
model.hiddenUnits: Hidden units in the classifier -> int

evaluate.thresholdValue: Threshold value for model evaluation -> int
evaluate.reportPath: Metrics path to save the model metrics -> string
